event.title: ACMW Distinguished Speaker Series: Morgan McKenney

description.paragraph: Morgan McKenney is the global business head for cross-currency payments at Citi ensuring corporate, financial institutions and public sector clients are able to make payments globally. Prior to this position she was the Chief Operating Officer of Global Treasury and Trade Solutions at Citi. Morgan will be highlighting her path to success as a woman in a technical field and sharing with us the potential future of digital currency.
We will be providing food and drinks. Once we have the location set, we will update the event information!

event.title: General Business Meeting
event.description: This meeting is open to everyone, so if you don’t know what ACM-W is, you can come to the meeting to find out who we are and what we do. This week, we will be discussing our plans for the diversity hackathon that we are hosting in April. If you’re interested in volunteering to help at the hackathon, please come to this meeting to get more information on how you can help out!
